files.description: Fix and fully implement the cosmo_contracts.markdown module with valid syntax and a stable public API so it can be imported in smoke tests and by users.
Pytest smoke test that imports all public entrypoints (including cosmo_contracts.markdown) and fails fast on any ImportError or SyntaxError regression.
GitHub Actions CI workflow that installs the package and runs pytest (including the import smoke test) on supported Python versions to prevent future import/syntax regressions.

missionDescription: Add a CI/pytest smoke test that imports key modules (including cosmo_contracts.markdown) to prevent regressions; fix the reported syntax error(s) and confirm `python -c 'import ...'` succeeds for all public entrypoints.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
